meeting_info.organization: Government Performance and Financial Management Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Briefing Room, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the April 23, 2024 Government Performance and Financial Management Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Status Update of Review of City Real Estate for Development and Redevelopment Opportunities
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the status of city real estate review for development opportunities.

agenda_items.title: Annual Review of Property Tax Exemptions for Over-65/ Disabled Homeowners
agenda_items.description: Annual review of property tax exemptions for eligible homeowners.
agenda_items.presenter: Janette Weedon, Director, Budget & Management Services

agenda_items.title: City Auditor’s Office FY 2024-25 Proposed Budget
agenda_items.description: Presentation of the proposed budget for the City Auditor's Office.
agenda_items.presenter: Mark Swann, City Auditor, Office of the City Auditor

agenda_items.title: FY 2024-25 Planned Budget: Information & Technology Services
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the planned budget for Information & Technology Services.
agenda_items.presenter: Dr. Brian Gardner, Interim Chief Information Officer

agenda_items.title: Atmos Dallas Annual Rate Review
agenda_items.description: Review of the annual rates for Atmos Dallas.
agenda_items.presenter: Nick Fehrenbach, Manager of Regulatory Affairs, Budget & Management Services

agenda_items.title: GPFM Two-Month Forecast
agenda_items.description: Presentation of the two-month forecast for the Government Performance and Financial Management.

agenda_items.title: Budget Accountability Report (Information as of March 31, 2024)
agenda_items.description: Report on budget accountability as of March 31, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Technology Accountability Report (Information as of April 30, 2024)
agenda_items.description: Report on technology accountability as of April 30, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Quarterly Investment Report - 2nd Quarter FY 2023-24
agenda_items.description: Presentation of the quarterly investment report for the second quarter.
